Steps.Description: Stealth Rock (use Flamethrower vs Hydreigon);
if it stays, switch to Chandelure, then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure;
if it still stays: 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Hydreigon: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Hydreigon, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Stealth Rock (use Flamethrower vs Hydreigon);
if it stays, siwtch into Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Hydreigon, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
if it uses Low kick;
and you get a Focus Sash, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
and you get a Life Orb, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Dragonite, use Stealth Rock;
if you get a Leftovers, switch to Blissey and use Softboiled. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if you get a Sitrus Berry, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Gliscor, switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches into Jellicent, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Eelektross, use Stealth Rock and then switch into Chandelure: 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed (use Shadow Ball vs Gengar).
if it switches into Umbreon, switch to Blissey and use Stealth Rock. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed. When Bisharp comes out, switch to Poliwrath and use Drain Punch.
Stealth Rock;
if it stays, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed (use Flamethrower vs Hydreigon).
if it switches into Hydreigon, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Switch to Blissey;
if it uses Fire Blast;
and it deals around 19.4-24.5% of damage, use Trick;
if it switches into Absol, switch into Metagross. Use Stealth Rock as it switches into Choice Scarf'd Hydreigon. Then switch into Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Eelektross, switch into metagross then use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed (use Shadow Ball vs Gengar).
if it switches into Lucario, switch to Chandelure 6x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
and it deals 29.1-34.4% damage, use Stealth Rock;
if it stays, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Hydreigon, switch to Chandelure, then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it uses Flamethrower or it switches out into Umbreon, switch to Metagross;
if it switches out into Dragonite, use Trick;
if it uses Dragon Claw, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Blissey and use Softboiled. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it uses Flamethrower, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it uses Superpower, use Trick;
if you get a Leftovers, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if you get a Sitrus Berry, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Eelektross, use Trick, then use Stealth Rock. Switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Toxicroak, use Stealth Rock;
if it stays, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into anything else, switch to Blissey and use Softboiled. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches out into Dragonite, switch to Metagross;
if it uses Dragon Claw, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Blissey and use Softboiled. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it uses Flamethrower, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it uses Superpower, use Trick;
if you get a Leftovers, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if you get a Sitrus Berry, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Toxicroak, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches out, switch to Blissey and use Softboiled. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Eelektross, switch to Metagross and use Trick. Use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Hydreigon, use Stealth Rock;
if it got damaged by Life Orb, switch to Chandelure, then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 3x
if not, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
if it uses Dragon Claw, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Blissey and use Softboiled. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it uses Fire Punch, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches unto Umbreon, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Stealth Rock, then switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then use Stealth Rock. Switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed (use Shadow Ball vs Gengar).
Use Trick;
if it stays, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Eelektross/Dragonite, use Stealth Rock, then swap the Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + 2x X.Speed (Scarfed froslass outspeeds +2. Energy ball Froslass.
Switch to Blissey and use Stealth Rock. Switch to Chandelure, then switch to Excadrill and kill it with Earthquake. Switch back into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed (use Shadow Ball vs Gengar).
Use Trick, then switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Switch to Chandelure;
if it uses Fire Blast, switch to Blissey, then switch to Metagross;
if it switches into Absol, use Stelath Rock;
if it stays, switch back into Chandelure, then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch again into Chandelure;
if it still stays: 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Hydreigon: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if Hydreigon comes out, swithc back into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it uses Flamethrower, switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
if it switches into Chandelure, switch to Blissey and use Stealth Rock. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed (use Earthquake vs Umbreon).
Use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure. Switch to Excadrill and use Earthquake. Switch back into Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed (use Shadow Ball vs Gengar).
Use Trick;
if it uses Aura Sphere;
and you get a Focus Sash, switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed. Use Flamethrower vs Hydreigon.
if it switches into Hydreigon, switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
and you get a Life Orb, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it uses Close Combat, switch to Chandelure 6x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Dragonite or Eelektross, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed (use Shadow Ball vs Gengar).
if it switches into Hydreigon, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Umbreon, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 6x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then use Stealth Rock. Switch to Chandelure;
if it stays: 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Hydreigon: 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then use Stealth Rock. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Switch to Blissey, then use Stealth Rock. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed. When Bisharp comes out, switch to Poliwrath and use Drain Punch.
Use Trick;
if it switches into Golurk, switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches into Hydreigon, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then use Stealth Rock;
if you get a Chesto Berry and they switched Chandelure in, switch yourself to Chandelure: 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if you get a Leftovers, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed (use Shadow Ball vs Gengar).
if it switches into Eelektross, switch to Chandelure, then switch to Excadrill and use Earthquake to kill it. Switch to Chadenlure: Calm Mind + X.Speed (use Shadow Ball vs Gengar).
if it switches into Umbreon, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure: 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Stealth Rock;
if it stays, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into anything else, switch to Blissey and use Softboiled. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Switch to Blissey, then switch to Metagross;
if it switches into Lucario, use Trick, then switch to Chandelure 6x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Toxicroak, use Stealth Rock;
if it stays, switch to Chandelure: 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed (if Bisharp is sent last, swap into Poliwrath and Drain Punch to kill)
if it switches into Dragonite or Umbreon, switch to Blissey and use Softboiled. Switch to Chandelure: 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Switch to Blissey, then switch to Metagross Trick. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
if it uses Close Combat, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Salamence, switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
if it uses Low Kick;
and you get an Air Balloon, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
and you get a Focus Sash or Life Orb, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it uses Night Slash, switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
if it uses Thunder Wave, switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches into Garchomp;
and you get a Life Orb, switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches out into Gyarados, switch to Poliwrath, then switch to second Metagross and use Thunder Punch to kill. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
and you get a Rocky Helmet, switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches into Krookodile, switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches out into Mismagius, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches out into Serperior, switch to Chandelure: 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

EXPERIMENTAL: if it switches back to Bisharp, use Flamethrower to kill it. Switch to 2nd Metagross and use Trick (Tyranitar should Crunch and then Fire Punch lock). Switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

if it switches out into Staraptor, switch to Blissey and tank Final Gambit. Switch to Chandelure, then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Switch to Blissey;
if it gets damaged by Life Orb, use Stealth Rock;
if it switches into Garchomp, switch to Chandelure, then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches into Honchkrow, switch to Chandelure, then switch to Metagross and use Thunder Punch. Switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance.
if it switches into Staraptor, switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Defend + X.Speed.
if it uses any move other than Fire Blast but doesn't get damaged by Life Orb, use Trick;
if it switches into Bisharp or Samurott, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

if it switches into Garchomp, switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock as it sends out Gyarados. Switch to Poliwrath, then switch to Metagross and use Thunder Punch to kill. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Haxorus, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it uses Fire Blast but doesn't get damaged by Life Orb or it missed, use Stealth Rock;
if it switches into Bisharp or Samurott, switch to Chandelure then switch to Metagross and use Trick.
if it uses Aqua Tail, switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
if it uses Sacred Sword, swithc into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Garchomp or Haxorus, switch to Chandelure, then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Honchkrows, switch to Metagross and use Thunder Punch. switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance.
if it switches into Staraptor, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
if it stays, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches out into Crobat, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Garchomp, switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches into Gyarados, switch into Poliwrath, switch into Metagross and use Thunder Punch to kill. Opponent should switch out into Chandelure. Switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
if you get a Life Orb, switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches out into Gyarados, switch to Poliwrath, then switch to second Metagross and use Thunder Punch to kill;
if Metagross HP is below 60%, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Chandelure switch to your own Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if you get Rocky Helmet, switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Use Thunder Punch to kill. Switch to Blissey, then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Switch to Blissey;
if it stays, switch to Metagross and use Thunder Punch. Switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance.
if it swiches into Krookodile, switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance.
Switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switc into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
if it uses Waterfall, Stealth Rock and switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
if it switches into Krookodile, switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + Swords Dance + X.Speed
if it switches into Spiritomb, use Stealth Rock as it switches into Krookodile. Switch to Excadrill: Swords Dance.
Switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + Swords Dance + X.Speed
Switch to Blissey;
if it switches into Garchomp, use Trick, then switch into Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches into Gyarados, switch to Poliwrath, then switch to Metagross and use Thunder Punch to kill, he will get Chandelure out;
if Metagross HP is higher than 60%, switch to Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if Metagross HP is lower than 60%, switch to Blissey, then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches into anything else, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Chandelure, then into Metagross and use Trick as it switches into Garchomp. Switch into Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Stealth Rock;
if it uses Superpower, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it uses Thunderbolt, switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches into Salamence, switch to Chandelure, then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
if it uses Flamethrower, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed (if Bisharp is sent last, swap into Poliwrath and Drain Punch to kill it)
if it uses any other move, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Tyranitar, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
if it switches into Bisharp, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Serperior, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Garchomp, switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches into Gliscor, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed (if Bisharp is sent last, swap into Poliwrath and Drain Punch to kill it)
if it switches into Samurott, switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
if it switches into Salamence, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Serperior, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
if it uses Aqua Tail, switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
if it switches into Serperior, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it uses Megahorn, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
if it switches into Dragonite, switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches into Garchomp, switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches into Serperior, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Sharpedo, switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it sends out Bisharp last, switch to Poliwrath and use Drain Punch.
Switch to Chandelure;
if it uses Foul Play, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it uses High Jump Kick, X. Special + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Switch to Blissey;
if it uses Foul Play, use Stealth Rock;
if it switches out into Garchomp, switch to Chandelure, then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches into Staraptor, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed + X.Defend.
if it uses Will-o-Wisp, use Stealth Rock;
if it switches into Honchkrow, switch to Metagross and use Thunder Punch. Switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance.
if it switches into Krookodile, switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance.
if it switches into Krookodile, switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + Swords Dance.
Switch to Blissey to tank Final Gambit. Switch to Chandelure, then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then switch to Chandelure: 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
if it uses Close Combat, switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Blissey, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Togekiss, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch back to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Togekiss, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch back to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

Use Trick, then switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock. Switch to the second Metagross then use Trick and use Earthquake, forcing Caitlin to switch to Emolga. Switch to Excadrill then switch to the Metagross without an Air Balloon to bait out Caitlin's Metagross Earthquake. Switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
if it uses Fire Blast, switch to Blissey and use Stealth Rock. Switch to Chandelure then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it uses Flamethrower, use Stealth Rock and then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Entei, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Umbreon, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Use Softboiled until it switches out into Entei, then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick.

if it switches back to Umbreon, use Trick again then switch to Poliwrath and use Drain Punch to kill. It will send out Mienshao, so switch to Chandelure and use Flamethrower to kill. Out comes Entei, so switch to the Metagross with Choice Scarf and use Trick. Switch back to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Entei / Altaria, switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Umbreon, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Use Stealth Rock then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
if it uses Flamethrower, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Togekiss, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch back to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Togekiss, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch back to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
if it uses Earthquake, switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches into Emolga, switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches into Serperior, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick, and use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed. (Use Energy Ball vs Snorlax);
if it switches into Mienshao, switch to Chandelure then switch to the second Metagross. Switch back into Chandelure, then switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
if it switches into Sigilyph, switch to Chandelure, then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.

if it switches out into Metagross, switch to your own second Metagross and use Trick, then use Earthquake. Switch to Excadrill then switch to the Metagross without an Air Balloon to bait out Earthquake from Caitlin's Metagross. Switch back into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches out into Serperior, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
if it uses Earthquake, switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it uses Surf,  use Stealth Rock, then switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.

if it switches into Emolga, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock. Switch to the second Metagross and use Trick, then use Earthquake. Switch to Excadrill then switch to any Metagross to bait out Earthquake from Caitlin's Metagross. Switch back into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
if you get Focus Sash, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if you get Life Orb, switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed. (Entei must use Sacred Fire on Chandelure)
if it switches into Umbreon, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Use Stealth Rock then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

if it switches into Emolga, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock, then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick, then use Earthquake. Switch to Excadrill then switch to any Metagross to bait out Earthquake from Caitlin's Metagross. Switch back into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
if it uses Sacred Sword, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed + X.Defend.
if it switches into Serperior, switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then switch to Chandelure 6x Calm Mind.
Switch to Blissey, then switch to Metagross and use Trick.
if it switches into Emolga, switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches into Serperior, switch to Blissey again and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + 2x X.Speed.
if Metagross uses Hammer Arm, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if Metagross switches out, switch to Blissey again and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if Gallade uses Sacred Sword, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed + X.Defend.
if it switches into Serperior, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
if it uses Thunderbolt, switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches into Reuniclus, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
if it uses Leaf Blade, use Stealth Rock;
if it stays, switch to Chandelure, then use Flamethrower to kill. Switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

if it switches into Emolga, switch to Excadrill then switch to Metagross. Switch to Chandelure then use Flamethrower to kill. Switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Entei, switch to Chandelure then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

if it switches into Emolga, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock, then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick, then use Earthquake. Switch to Excadrill then switch to any Metagross to bait out Earthquake from Caitlin's Metagross. Switch back into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
if it uses Earthquake;
and you get an Air Balloon, use Stealth Rock.
if it switches into Emolga, switch to Excadrill, then switch to the second Metagross;
if Emolga stays, use Trick then switch to Excadrill, then switch to any Metagross. Switch back into Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.

if it switches into Metagross, switch to Excadrill then switch to the scarfed Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Excadrill then switch to any Metagross to bait Caitlin's Metagross to use Earthquake.
if it switches into Entei, switch to Chandelure, then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
and you get Choice Scarf, switch to Excadrill: 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
and you get Life Orb, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it uses Hammer Arm;
and you get Choice Scarf, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed. (Use Energy Ball vs. Snorlax)
if Snorlax switches in while you switch to Chandelure, switch to Blissey and use Trick;
if it stays, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Mienshao, switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed. Use Healing Items if necessary.
if Snorlax switches in while you set up Stealth Rock, switch to Chandelure, then switch to Blissey and use Trick.
if it stays, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Mienshao, switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed. Use Healing Items if necessary.
and you get Life Orb, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it swiches into Umbreon, switch to Blissey and use Softboiled. Switch back into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into anything else, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it uses Meteor Smash, switch into Poliwrath: X.Speed + Belly Drum
if it switches into Altaria, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Entei, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Umbreon, switch to Blissey then use Trick. Use Stealth Rock then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Emolga, switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches into Serperior, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Serperior;
and you get Leftovers, switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
and you get Life Orb, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Reuniclus, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Vaporeon, switch to Poliwrath then switch to Metagross. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Snorlax, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure. Switch to Metagross then switch back into Chandelure. Switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
if it switches into Staraptor, switch to Chandelure 6x Calm Mind.
if it switches into Umbreon, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Blissey and use Trick. Use Softboiled then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Switch to Chandelure;
if it stays, switch to Metagross and use Stealth Rock;
if it still stays, switch back into Chandelure, then use Shadow Ball. Switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch once more into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Altaria, switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

if it switches into Umbreon, switch to Poliwrath and use Drain Punch. Switch to Blissey and use Trick. Use Proect then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches out into Snorlax, switch to Chandelure again then switch to Blissey and use Trick;
if it uses Body Slam, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Metagross, switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
if it switches into Mienshao, switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
if it switches into Altaria, switch to Metagross and use Stealth Rock. Switch back into Chandelure, then switch back into Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Snorlax, switch to Metagross and use Trick. Use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Sigilyph, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

if it switches into Umbreon, switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches back to Mienshao. Use Protect and switch back to Metagross as it switches into Entei. Use Trick. Switch to Chandelure: 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
if it uses Scald, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 6x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Emolga, switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches into Serperior, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + 2x X.Speed.
if it switches into Metagross, switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Serperior, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Staraptor, switch to Chandelure 6x Calm Mind

if it switches into Entei, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Umbreon, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Use Softboilder/Stealth Rock, then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Umbreon, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Blissey and use Trick. Use Softboiled and switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

if it uses Close Combat, switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

if it switches into Absol / Metagross, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Staraptor, switch to Chandelure 6x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Stealth Rock (use Energy Ball vs. Snorlax):
if it uses Thunderbolt, switch to Excadrill, then switch to Blissey and use Trick;
if it switches into Metagross, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Mienshao, switch to Blissey and use Softbolied. Switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches out into Snorlax, switch to Chandelure then switch to Blissey and use trick;
if it uses Body Slam, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Mienshao, switch to Metagross, then switch to Chandelure again. Switch to Metagross again then switch to Chandelure once more. Switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
if it switches into Mienshao, switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Metagross, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Umbreon, switch to Blissey and use Trick;
if it switches into Mienshao, switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches into Staraptor, switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
if you get Leftovers, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed.
if you get Life Orb, use Stealth Rock and then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
if it uses Heat Wave, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Make sure it's locked to Stone Edge and not High Jump Kick. Switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches into Snorlax, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Mienshao, switch to Chandelure, then switch to Metagross. Switch back into Chandelure, then switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.

if it switches into Togekiss, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then use Stealth Rock. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

if it switches into Mienshao, switch to Chandelure, then switch to Metagross. It will use High Jump Kick again, so switch back into Chandelure. It sends in Snorlax Crunch, so switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
if it switches into Sigilyph, switch to Chandelure, then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

if it doesn't, use Trick;
if it stays, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

if it switches into Metagross, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

if it switches out into Latias, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Volcarona, switch to Chandelure, then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches out into Reuniclus, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Switch to Blissey and use Stealth Rock;
if it got damaged by Life Orb, switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
if it uses Meteor Mash, switch to Chandelure and use Flamethrower. Switch to second Metagross and use Trick.
if Sandslash used Earthquake, switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if Vaporeon used Hydro Pump, switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
if it didn't, switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then use Stealth rock. Switch to Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches out after setting up hazards, switch to Chandelure, then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
if it uses Megahorn, use Stealth Rock and then switch to Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches out into Latias, Stealth Rock and then switch to Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches out into Reuniclus, use Stealth Rock. Switch to Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches out after setting up hazards, switch to Chandelure, then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick;
if you get Focus Sash, switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches into Vaporeon, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if you get Leftovers, switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Use Trick, then switch to Excadrill: Stealth Rock + 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Switch to Chandelure 3x Cal Mind + X.Speed.
Use Trick.
if it uses Hydro Pump, use Stealth Rock, then switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
if it uses Scald, switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
if it switches into Conkeldurr, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Volcarona, switch to Blissey, then switch to second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Latios, switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches into Sandslash, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Switch to Blissey and use Stealth Rock.
if it says, switch to Chandelure, then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch back to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Conkeldurr, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Archeops, switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches into Bouffalant, switch to Chandelure, then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it switches into Conkeldurr, switch to Chandelure, then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches out into Vaporen, switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
if it switches into Escavalier, switch to Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Excadrill, switch to Chandelure, then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to your own Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if it doesn't get damaged by Life Or
if Excadrill is sent out, switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to your own Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if Lucario is sent out, use Stealth Rock again and see what happens:
if it uses Close Combat, send in Metagross and use Trick.
if it stays, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it switches into Dragonite, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

if it uses Crunch / Extreme Speed, switch to Metagross, then switch to Chandelure. Switch to Metagross, then switch to Chandelure, then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if it uses Meteor Smash, switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
if Lucario got an attack boost from Meteor Smash, switch to Chandelure and then use Flamethrower to kill. Switch to Metagross and use Trick.
if Braviary used Close Combat, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
if Sandslash used Earthquake, switch to Excadrill: 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
if Vaporeon used Hydro Pump, switch to Poliwrath: Belly Drum + X.Speed.
if it switches into Reuniclus, switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed.
